briefTitle: Long-term Extension Trial in Subjects With Atopic Dermatitis Who Participated in Previous Tralokinumab Trials - ECZTEND
officialTitle: An Open-label, Single-arm, Multi-centre, Long-term Extension Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Tralokinumab in Subjects With Atopic Dermatitis Who Participated in Previous Tralokinumab Clinical Trials
summary: The purpose of this extension trial is to evaluate the long-term safety of tralokinumab.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Adverse Events From Baseline Through the Last Treatment Visit (up to Week 268)
